item.title: Overview
item.description: üöß Coming Soon This part of our new Website is not ready yet. raise NotImplementedError("Stay Tuned") Mj√∂lnir (or mjolnir) is a moderation tool for Matrix. Visit the project page for more information.

item.title: Commands
item.description: ‚ùå Danger Keep in mind, some of the commands listed below can do a massive amount of damage with just a single command! Do not run any command, if you don’t know what it does. Make sure to read this documentation thoroughly before using the bot. Mj√∂lnir Commands # To run a Mj√∂lnir command, make sure you are in the Mj√∂lnir command and control room. üí° Note: Access to the Command and Control Room If you don’t have access to the room Mj√∂lnir command and control room, please contact Michael.

item.title: Examples
item.description: ‚ùå Danger Keep in mind, some commands shown below can do a massive amount of damage with just a single command! Do not run any command, if you don’t know what it does. Make sure to read this documentation thoroughly before using the bot. Ban a user # To ban a user, use the following command. mjolnir ban <list shortcode> <user> <glob> [reason] Example # mjolnir ban coc @user:example.tld spam Add the user to the Code of Conduct ban list  #code-of-conduct-bans:michaelsasser.
